Scripts.OnClick: if IsAltKeyDown() then SBFOptions:Nudge("right", 10) else SBFOptions:Nudge("right", 1) end
if IsAltKeyDown() then SBFOptions:Nudge("left", 10) else SBFOptions:Nudge("left", 1) end
if IsAltKeyDown() then SBFOptions:Nudge("up", 10) else SBFOptions:Nudge("up", 1) end
if IsAltKeyDown() then SBFOptions:Nudge("down", 10) else SBFOptions:Nudge("down", 1) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOP") if SCT and (SCT:Get("SHOWFADE", SCT.FRAMES_TABLE) == SCT.MSG) then GameTooltip:AddLine(SBFOptions.strings.SCTCRITTTM1) GameTooltip:AddLine(SBFOptions.strings.SCTCRITTTM2) else GameTooltip:AddLine(SBFOptions.strings.SCTCRITTT) end GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOP") for k,v in pairs(SBFOptions.strings.SPELLTTLHELP) do GameTooltip:AddLine(v) end GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnClick: this.parent.page = this.parent.page + 1 this.parent.html:SetText(this.parent.pages[this.parent.page]) if this.parent.page == #this.parent.pages then this:Disable() end this.parent.pageStr:SetText(this.parent.page.."/"..#this.parent.pages) SBFOHelpFramePrevButton:Enable()

this.parent.page = this.parent.page - 1 this.parent.html:SetText(this.parent.pages[this.parent.page]) if this.parent.page == 1 then this:Disable() end this.parent.pageStr:SetText(this.parent.page.."/"..#this.parent.pages) SBFOHelpFrameNextButton:Enable()

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if (arg1 == "LeftButton") and IsAltKeyDown() then this.moving = 1 this:StartMoving() end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if this.moving then this:StopMovingOrSizing() this.moving = nil end
